data.thought: S12|H|S10|Reactive+Container Phenotype B2: 'Webhook-Triggered Pipelines'. Notebook exposes webhook endpoint. On GitHub push/PR: spawns container, clones repo, runs custom analysis (security scan, perf test, doc gen). Results stream to Observatory. Thoughtbox reasons about findings, generates PR comments. Observable: pipeline stages, container logs, AI annotations. Like GitHub Actions but w/ embedded reasoning + live visualization.
